title: Dawn to Dusk
description: Christi Black has been an outlaw for the past seven years of her life. The lifestyle was not her original choice, but now she is set firmly on that path. That is, until a bounty hunter steps into her life and flips everything she knows upside down, and forcing her to rethink her previous decisions. With a lot of help, and a little bit of letting go, Christi begins to see the truth in her life, and just how wrong she was.
author: Riana Rain
